verses.verse: עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now תִּתְגֹּדְדִ֣י <S%H1413><s%> Now gather בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter גְּד֔וּד <S%H1416><s%> thyself in troops מָצ֖וֹר <S%H4692><s%> siege שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> he hath laid עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against בַּשֵּׁ֙בֶט֙ <S%H7626><s%> with a rod יַכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> against us they shall smite עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַלְּחִ֔י <S%H3895><s%> upon the cheek אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שֹׁפֵ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> the judge יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you בֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <S%H1035><s%> But thou Bethlehem אֶפְרָ֗תָה <S%H672><s%> Ephratah צָעִיר֙ <S%H6810><s%> [though] thou be little לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> to be among בְּאַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> among the thousands יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at לִ֣י יֵצֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> [yet] out of thee shall he come forth לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> unto me [that is] to be ruler בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וּמוֹצָאֹתָ֥יו <S%H4163><s%> whose goings forth מִקֶּ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> [have been] from of old מִימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of eternity

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִתְּנֵ֔ם <S%H5414><s%> Therefore will he give them up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> them until עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> until the time יוֹלֵדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> [that] she which travaileth יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> hath brought forth וְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> then the remnant אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> of his brethren יְשׁוּב֖וּן <S%H7725><s%> shall return עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְעָמַ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> And he shall stand וְרָעָה֙ <S%H7462><s%> and feed בְּעֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> in the strength יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God בִּגְא֕וֹן <S%H1347><s%> in the majesty שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> of the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> his God וְיָשָׁ֕בוּ <S%H3427><s%> and they shall abide כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> time יִגְדַּ֖ל <S%H1431><s%> for now shall he be great עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> And this [man] shall be the peace אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <S%H804><s%> when the Assyrian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come בְאַרְצֵ֗נוּ <S%H776><s%> into our land וְכִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When יִדְרֹךְ֙ <S%H1869><s%> and when he shall tread בְּאַרְמְנֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H759><s%> in our palaces וַהֲקֵמֹ֤נוּ <S%H6965><s%> then shall we raise עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> against שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> against him seven רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> shepherds וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight נְסִיכֵ֥י <S%H5257><s%> principal אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> men

וְרָע֞וּ <S%H7489><s%> afflict אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> of Assyria בַּחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land נִמְרֹ֖ד <S%H5248><s%> of Nimrod בִּפְתָחֶ֑יהָ <S%H6607><s%> in the entrances וְהִצִּיל֙ <S%H5337><s%> thereof thus shall he deliver מֵֽאַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> [us] from the Assyrian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> when he cometh בְאַרְצֵ֔נוּ <S%H776><s%> into our land וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and when יִדְרֹ֖ךְ <S%H1869><s%> and when he treadeth בִּגְבוּלֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H1366><s%> within our borders ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> Then שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> And the remnant יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7130><s%> shall be in the midst עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> of many כְּטַל֙ <S%H2919><s%> as a dew מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD כִּרְבִיבִ֖ים <S%H7241><s%> as the showers עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֵ֑שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> upon the grass אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יְקַוֶּה֙ <S%H6960><s%> that tarrieth לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> not for man וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Or יְיַחֵ֖ל <S%H3176><s%> nor waiteth לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <S%H7611><s%> And the remnant יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> shall be among the Gentiles בְּקֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> of many כְּאַרְיֵה֙ <S%H738><s%> as a lion בְּבַהֲמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> among the beasts יַ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest כִּכְפִ֖יר <S%H3715><s%> as a young lion בְּעֶדְרֵי־ <S%H5739><s%> among the flocks צֹ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> of sheep אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> Which אִם <S%H518><s%> if עָבַ֛ר <S%H5674><s%> who if he go through וְרָמַ֥ס <S%H7429><s%> both treadeth down וְטָרַ֖ף <S%H2963><s%> and teareth in pieces וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and none can deliver

תָּרֹ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> shall be lifted up יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> Thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against צָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6862><s%> upon thine adversaries וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> and all thine enemies יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off פ

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> that I will cut off סוּסֶ֖יךָ <S%H5483><s%> thy horses מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> out of the midst וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֖י <S%H6><s%> of thee and I will destroy מַרְכְּבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4818><s%> thy chariots

וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> And I will cut off עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> the cities אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> of thy land וְהָרַסְתִּ֖י <S%H2040><s%> and throw down כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִבְצָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4013><s%> all thy strong holds

וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> And I will cut off כְשָׁפִ֖ים <S%H3785><s%> witchcrafts מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> out of thine hand וּֽמְעוֹנְנִ֖ים <S%H6049><s%> and thou shalt have no [more] soothsayers לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> will have לָֽךְ׃

וְהִכְרַתִּ֧י <S%H3772><s%> also will I cut off פְסִילֶ֛יךָ <S%H6456><s%> Thy graven images וּמַצֵּבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4676><s%> and thy standing images מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> out of the midst וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you will no תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֥ה <S%H7812><s%> of thee and thou shalt no more worship ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לְמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hands

וְנָתַשְׁתִּ֥י <S%H5428><s%> And I will pluck up אֲשֵׁירֶ֖יךָ <S%H842><s%> thy groves מִקִּרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> out of the midst וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֖י <S%H8045><s%> of thee so will I destroy עָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5892><s%> your cities

וְעָשִׂ֜יתִי <S%H6213><s%> And I will execute בְּאַ֧ף <S%H639><s%> in anger וּבְחֵמָ֛ה <S%H2534><s%> and fury נָקָ֖ם <S%H5359><s%> vengeance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> upon the heathen אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> such as they have not heard ס
